judicialResults.label: Community order varied
judicialResults.resultText:
COV - Community order varied
Order made on 24/10/2025 by South East London Youth Court varied. The end date of the order has been changed and the requirements must be complied with by 08/12/2025. The new and amended requirements are shown below. The responsible officer nominated is a probation officer. The supervising court is Bexley Magistrates' Court.
